title: Linux iostat Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful iostat command in Linux, learn to analyze CPU and I/O statistics, and monitor disk performance for effective system monitoring and management.

meta.title: Linux iostat Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful iostat command in Linux, learn to analyze CPU and I/O statistics, and monitor disk performance for effective system monitoring and management.
meta.keywords: Linux, iostat, system monitoring, performance analysis, disk I/O, CPU statistics
